properties.entry: SELECT ROOM_TYPE, ROOM_RATES, ROOM_THUMBNAIL FROM ROOM_TB T WHERE MAX_NUM >= ? AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION R WHERE (CHECK_IN BETWEEN ? AND ? OR CHECK_OUT BETWEEN ? AND ?) AND T.ROOM_TYPE = R.ROOM_TYPE) < 3
SELECT ROOM_RATES FROM ROOM_TB WHERE ROOM_TYPE = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION WHERE (CHECK_IN BETWEEN ? AND ? OR CHECK_OUT BETWEEN ? AND ?) AND ROOM_NO = ?

SELECT PAYTYPE, TO_CHAR(PAYMENT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS') PAYMENT_DT, ROOM_RATES, PAYMENT_AMOUNT FROM PAYMENT JOIN RESERVATION R USING(REQUEST_NO) JOIN ROOM_TB T ON(R.ROOM_TYPE = T.ROOM_TYPE) WHERE REQUEST_NO = ?
